name: technology
description: Main technology or language included in the payload

name: sonar_url
description: SonarQube URL for uploading the results

name: sonar_path
description: Full path to the sonar-scanner or sonar-scanner.bat file

name: auth_token
description: Token used for connecting to SonarQube

name: base_dir
description: Full path to the project repository files

name: src_path
description: Relative location inside the payload where the source files can be found

name: bin_path
description: Relative location inside the payload where the compiled files can be found

name: test_path
description: Relative location inside the payload where the unit tests can be found

name: action
description: Action to be performed by this module
